name: Blast Ant Omega
description:
Blast Ant Omega - The Strategy Game of Exploding Ants

Part of Ludum Dare 43: Sacrifices Must Be Made

Welcome to the exciting world of exploding ants! Take the role of a Colobopsis cylindrica and avoid enemy ants and traps. Your friends may act like a hive mind, but their thoughts are empty! So explode your way through maps to get your ants to safety!
